shadho.spaces.ContinuousSpace¶

class shadho.spaces.ContinuousSpace(distribution=’uniform’, strategy=’random’, scaling=’linear’, rng=None, seed=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A continuous real interval fit to a probability distribution.

Parameters:

*args : tuple

The tuple containing arbitrary arguments for use with the probability distribution.

distribution : {str, scipy.stats.rv_continuous}, optional

The name of the probability distribution or a subclass of the scipy base continuous probability distribution.

strategy : {‘random’, ‘tpe’, …}, optional

The search strategy to use, as defined in shadho.strategies

scaling : {‘linear’, ‘ln’, ‘log10’, ‘log2’}, optional

The scaling function to apply to generated values.

rng : {None, numpy.random.RandomState}, optional

The random number generator to use. None will create a new RNG seeded by seed.

seed : {None, int, array_like}, optional

Random seed to use with rng. See the ``numpy.random.RandomState documentation<https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.random.RandomState.html#numpy.random.RandomState>“_ for details.

**kwargs : dict

Arbitrary additional key/value pairs for use with the probability distribution.
Raises:

DistributionDoesNotExist

Raised when the supplied probability distribution is not a standard scipy.stats distribution or not a subclass of scipy.stats.rv_continuous

Methods

complexity() Determine the complexity of the search space.
generate() Generate a value from this space.
to_spec() Generate the specification for this search space.
__init__(distribution=’uniform’, strategy=’random’, scaling=’linear’, rng=None, seed=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
complexity()[source]¶

Determine the complexity of the search space.

The complexity is defined as

..math::
2 + |b - a|

where (a, b) is the interval containing 99%% of the probability distribution.

generate()[source]¶

Generate a value from this space.

Returns a random value from the probability distribution based on the search strategy and scaled by the scaling function.

to_spec()[source]¶

Generate the specification for this search space.

This space is specified by its probability distribution, search strategy, and scaling function. This function allows the space to be saved for checkpointing and analysis.
